pages.text: Skip to content Seven Days A Week Welcome to Charleston'sBest Waterfront Dining & Raw Bar! Reservations Menus Now available: The Fleet Landing Cookbook This collection contains over 60 carefully-crafted recipes that have been fan favorites at Fleet Landing for two decades. With stunning full-color photographs along with stories about our historic building and the journey of our restaurant, this cookbook is more than just recipes, it's a slice of Charleston history. Available for purchase in store or on our website - click SHOP above! Our Location Fleet Landing is located at 186 Concord Street at the foot of the City Market in Historic Downtown Charleston. HOURS OF OPERATION: Seven Days a Week 11am-3:30pm Seven Days a Week 5pm-10pm Lunch: Dinner: Both the main and raw bars are open for drinks and snacks during the transition from lunch to dinner! Reservations are recommended, especially for nights and weekends, and we are unable to accept reservations via email as it reaches an offsite office. The largest group that we are able to accommodate is 10 guests. For information on reservations click here! strongly There is a parking garage across the street at the corner of Cumberland and Concord Streets. There is also street parking on Concord Street.
